page.title: 04BILLERICAY NW Marketing
page.content: {Marketing: Business is conducted by telephone. Of the grain produced, large quantities of wheat and barley are used for feeding cattle. Some wheat is sent to London for breadmaking whilst oats are bought for use as porridge. Quantities of produce are exported. {Changes in the last ten years. The greatest change was the increased skill of the plant breeders, allied to the skill of the farmer which together had increased the crop yield by 20%. The fact the land could now be irrigated has also increased the yield. Machinery is available for this purpose. The Commom Market has effected further change by encouraging different crops, e.g. rape, the seed of which is used for its oil.
